metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1393 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in X.Org Server Overlay Window. A Use-After-Free may leadto local privilege escalation. If a client explicitly destroys thecompositor overlay window (aka COW), the Xserver would leave a danglingpointer to that window in the CompScreen structure, which will trigger ause-after-free later.

criterions.comment: xorg-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server-hwe-16.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
